summary: Diff adds a new offline static site bundle under frontend/offline-bundle with index.html, local CSS/JS, and local images, plus a README. However, the diff summary is truncated for index.html/JS/README, so several acceptance-criteria details (JS loading method/order, absence of CDN/absolute paths, and README folder-structure listing) cannot be fully verified from the provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: CSS is loaded before JS in index.html, and JS is loaded in a way that does not require a server (e.g., deferred scripts).
missing_requirements.reason: index.html is truncated and does not show any <script> tags, so JS loading order and whether scripts are deferred/appropriate for file:// cannot be confirmed from the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: No external (CDN) dependencies are used; all libraries, icons, and fonts referenced by the offline site are present locally and linked via relative paths; no absolute paths or localhost/server URLs are used.
missing_requirements.reason: index.html/css/js are truncated and do not show the full set of referenced resources/URLs; the diff summary does not explicitly demonstrate that no external URLs/CDNs/absolute paths are present across the whole bundle.

missing_requirements.requirement: README lists or illustrates the offline bundle folder structure.
missing_requirements.reason: README.md is shown only up to the '## Folder Structure' heading and an opening code fence; the actual structure listing is not present in the provided diff summary.
